department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Double strand of small silver beads becomes single strand at 11 ends; 12 groups of squash blossoms overlaid with clusters of small elliptical Miami turquoises; sheet naja set with 17 Miami turquoise mounted; serrated bezels, 96 stones total in groups; silver strand ends in silver clasp. J.#395, Cat.#436.
title: Necklace
